introduction: Hey there! I’m someone who’s just starting out in the world of technology.I enjoy learning new things, trying to build simple projects, and improving my skills little by little.This website is where I keep track of what I’m learning, share my small coding experiments, and jot down ideas as I go.If you’re curious, feel free to look around.
